text: one abiotic function generates land cover data, getNLCDData(). getNLCDData() retrieves land cover data Multi-Resolution Land Characteristics Consortium‚Äôs National Land Cover Database (NLCD) sampling sites catchment watershed scales. function directly accesses EPA StreamCat API (Hill et al.¬†2015) gather NLCD data based sampling location NHDPlus COMIDs collection year. getNLCDData() matches sampling sites NLCD data time. NLCD data currently available within StreamCat following years: 2001, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2011, 2013, 2016, 2019, plans include subsequent years become available. instances samples match collection year year NLCD data, samples matched closest year NLCD data. instance, site sampled 1995 matched 2001 NLCD data. samples (e.g.¬†collection year 2005) fall midpoint two NLCD years (e.g.¬†2004 2006 NLCD data), function pulls NLCD data earlier year (e.g.¬†2004 NLCD data). Users can specify whether NLCD data extracted catchment Cat watershed Ws scales. catchment includes land drains directly stream segment sampling location, excluding contributions upstream segments watershed. contrast, watersheds larger catchments include land drains directly stream segment surrounding uplands, plus upstream contributions flow-connected stream segments. See StreamCat documentation information. NLCD data can grouped five broad categories using group = TRUE. categories include ‚Äúwater‚Äù (grouping wetland open water land covers), ‚Äúurban‚Äù (grouping urban land use), ‚Äúforest‚Äù (grouping deciduous, coniferous, mixed forests land covers), ‚Äúopen‚Äù (grouping shrub, barren land, grassland, hay/pasture land covers), ‚Äúcrop‚Äù (cultivated crop land use).

title: Match data from the National Land Cover Database to each fish and macroinvertebrate sampling site ‚Äî getNLCDData
text: Function returns site year dataframe NLCD data either catchment watershed scale.

title: Match data from the National Land Cover Database to each fish and macroinvertebrate sampling site ‚Äî getNLCDData
text: Land-use/land-cover data extracted Multi-Resolution Land Characteristics (MRLC) Consortium National Land Cover Database (NLCD). LULC data available following years: 2001, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2011, 2013, 2016, 2019. years input data exact year matches list, years matched closest year NLCD data (e.g. site sampled 1995 NLCD data 2001). Note samples fall midpoint two NLCD years (e.g. 2005), function defaults earlier year (e.g. site sampled 2005 NLCD data 2004). Data can extracted catchment ("Cat") watershed ("Ws") scales. catchment includes land area drains directly sampled stream segment medium-resolution National Hydrography Dataset version 2.(NHDPlusV2), excludes data upstream segments. watershed scale includes data local catchment upstream contributing catchments. NLCD data can grouped (group = TRUE) five broad categories. categories include "water" (grouping wetland open water land covers), "urban" (grouping urban land covers), "forest" (grouping deciduous, coniferous, mixed forests), "open" (grouping shrub, barren land, grassland, hay/pasture), "crop" (grouping, just crop land use). function gathers catchment/watershed NLCD data StreamCat database (Hill et al. 2016) via StreamCat API (https://www.epa.gov/national-aquatic-resource-surveys/streamcat-metrics-rest-api).

title: Match data from the National Land Cover Database to each fish and macroinvertebrate sampling site ‚Äî getNLCDData
text: Hill, Ryan ., Marc H. Weber, Scott G. Leibowitz, Anthony R. Olsen, Darren J. Thornbrugh, 2016. Stream-Catchment (StreamCat) Dataset: Database Watershed Metrics Conterminous United States. Journal American Water Resources Association (JAWRA) 52:120-128. DOI: 10.1111/1752-1688.12372.

title: Match data from the National Land Cover Database to each fish and macroinvertebrate sampling site ‚Äî getNLCDData

title: Match data from the National Land Cover Database to each fish and macroinvertebrate sampling site ‚Äî getNLCDData
code: if (FALSE) { ## Code to generate the percent land-use/land-cover in the catchment for ## site numbers "USGS-05276005" and "USGS-01390450" from 2007 2008, respectively.    dat = data.frame(SiteNumber = c("USGS-05276005","USGS-01390450"),                    CollectionYear = c(2007,2008))    getNLCDData(data=dat,   scale = "Cat",   group = FALSE)  ## Code to generate the percent land-use/land-cover in the catchment for ## all samples in the base macroinvertebrate dataset, and grouping those ## LULC data into broad categories.    invertDat1 <- getInvertData()   invertDat1_forNLCD <- invertDat1 %>%     dplyr::select(SiteNumber, CollectionYear)     dat1 = data.frame(invertDat1_forNLCD)    getNLCDData(data=dat1,   scale = "Cat",   group = TRUE)   }
